summary:
- **Exploration Update**:  
  - Exploration commenced at 100%-owned Errolls Gold Project (WA).  
  - Soil sampling underway on western magnetic trend; results expected within 10 days.  
  - RC drilling targeting high-grade gold (e.g., 22m @ 7.46g/t Au) to start in early August.  
  - Aircore drilling planned for northern extension of mineralization (previously unexplored).  

*Note*: No material financial, capital structure, or trading-sensitive information identified. Pure operational update.
